TopicTitle: Manned Maneuvering Unit (MMU) (With arm)/ Space Station [IMAGE HEAVY]

Articles.Content:
So I often find myself using all my EVA fuel and i'm stranded, or I don't have enough fuel to travel from place to place. Also one design flaw in the EVA jetpacks is that it cannot roll on its side, so you often find yourself trying to get onto a sideways capsule. This MMU has a small probe on it for SAS and has the ability to roll, giving it more maneuverability over than the EVA suits. Introducing the Hercules jet pack Mk.7

-Craft file: http://www./download/jt5312exkjob00f/Hercules_Jetpack_MK_7.craft

It contains:

-1 Radioisotope Thermometric Generator (RTG)

-2 Stratus-V Roundified Monopropellant Tank (Round RCS tanks carrying 40- of monopropellant each) ... 80-of monopropellant.

-1 Probodobodyne OKTO

-4 Place Anywhere 7 Linear RCS Ports

-2 RV-105 RCS Thruster Block

-1 Clamp-O-Tron Jr.

-1 EAS-1 External Command Seat

I recommend keeping SAS on for this craft.

Space Station inspection-

I made a modded MMU with a arm on it a long time ago, but now this was the only surviving image. The MMU is the object on the left attached to the command capsule.

And... here's my Aquila Space Station

Here's the (current) space station in a 120km orbit

This is the Phobos 5 Launcher and the Deimos Tug that carried every single piece of the space station into orbit and docked with it.

This is the Pieces V with the Cassiopeia II Crew Transport Vehicle and Crew Launcher.

This is Pieces V, It carries a 3 man crew, able to reach orbit, re-enter and land safely, and dock the the Aquila Space Station. (120-121 km up)

I will be launching...

-MMU

-Ion Engines (re-boosters for the space station)

-Science Module/Equipment

-Comm- Array

-more solar panels

-[Post your ideas down below)

Also Yes, this was a old post from a while ago, but I wanted to bring this back to attention with new content.
